channel.title: Montvid's code snippets
channel.description: Recent content on Montvid's code snippets

item.title: Reinstalling a Mac - No bag entry
item.description: Some Mac’s don’t let you reinstall (Option-Shift-Command-R default MacOS version or Option-Command-R new version) MacOS because they can’t update their internal time - error No bag entry. To change the date (month/day/time/year) in Terminal do: date 041111582024

item.title: How to import new TLS certificate into UNIFI wifi controller
item.description: This is how I fix the unifi controller in terminal: openssl pkey -in example.key -traditional -out transformed-private.key java -jar /usr/lib/unifi/lib/ace.jar import_key_cert transformed-private.key example.crt example.ca
